extendedInfo.description: CheckersWant to play some classic board game on your Android?Checkers â a new free version of the old-school strategy game - will seem to you really addictive! Originally the game should be played with two players. Now you can enjoy your favorite table game alone against android.Remember original rules: one player has dark pieces, and another - light pieces. The pieces should move diagonally on the board from square to square. You should use the logic and jump over the pieces of your adversary. When you do that you can take the opponentâs piece from the board.Checkers features:- Original rules of the table game;- Old-school gameplay for all amateurs of classic strategies;- Nice graphic and user-friendly interface;- Possibility to play against Android;- Free app, no ads.Show your intelligence in the game Checkers and take all the pieces of the opponent!
